metadata.title: CVE-2024-22120 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: Zabbix server can perform command execution for configured scripts. Aftercommand is executed, audit entry is added to "Audit Log". Due to "clientip"field is not sanitized, it is possible to injection SQL into "clientip" andexploit time based blind SQL injection.

criterions.comment: zabbix package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
